article_title: Aaron Gordon vs. Zach LaVine at NBA Slam Dunk Contest
article_text:
The NBA’s biggest superstars will take center court Sunday night during the NBA All-Star weekend, but it was a pair of 20 year olds stole the show Saturday night.

Minnesota’s Zach LaVine and Orlando’s Aaron Gordon had one of the greatest battles in the history of the NBA Slam Dunk Contest.

LaVine edged out Gordon for his second straight title. It was beautiful. Just watch.
